jobs_results.title: Devops Developer
jobs_results.description: Job Description:What to Expect: Manage all development infrastructures such as workstation, server, storage, network and data protectionProvision virtual machines, application software and licenses for development teamDevelop scripts to automate build, software release, application deployment and system and application managementConduct system level security scan, harden system and application platform and recommend application secure coding and other best practicesConduct application performance testingEvaluate and recommend application development platforms, such as but not limited to Content Management Platform, Business Process Management Platform, Application Lifecycle Management Platform How to Succeed: Degree or Diploma in Computer Science, Computer or Electronics Engineering, Information Technology or related disciplinesMinimum 3 years of experience in AWS/Azure, DevOps CI/CD, GCPMinimum 3 years' experience in application development and scripting on UNIX/Linux and/or Windows... platformMinimum 3 years' experience in databases such as Microsoft SQL, Oracle or any other enterprise databasesMinimum 3 years' experience system/application securityExperience in agile development environment will be an added advantageExperience with Atlassian products will be an added advantageExperience with HP Load Runner or any other open-source load testing tools will be an added advantageExperience with Metasploit, w3af or any other system security testing tools will be an added advantageCertifications such as Red Hat Certified Engineer, Microsoft Certified Solution Expert for Server and/or Desktop Infrastructure, Microsoft Certified Solution Expert for Data Platform, Microsoft Certified DBA or Oracle Certified DBA will be an added advantage #LI-CTSAPACEmployee Status : Full Time EmployeeShift : Day JobTravel : NoJob Posting : Dec 15 2020

jobs_results.title: Apps Dev Sr. Programmer Analyst
jobs_results.description:
The Applications Development Senior Programmer Analyst is an intermediate level position responsible for participation in the establishment and implementation of new or revised application systems and programs in coordination with the Technology team. The overall objective of this role is to contribute to applications systems analysis and programming activities.

Key Responsibilities
• Work on a next-generation credit check platform in line with strategic business goals:
• Build and rollout the platform for new systems thus expanding client footprint
• Extend platform functionalities for existing systems per business requirements
• Expand platform processing capabilities by improving performance and stability
• Develop and deliver on application components to meet business needs
• Participate in architectural design and review of key application components
• Co-ordinate with the global team on platform build-out
• Work with business stakeholders on requirements analysis and solution... design
• Assist local leads in project estimation, planning, and resource management

Key Relationships:
• Credit Risk Management/Credit Delivery Team
• Business stakeholders across different asset classes – Equities, FX, Commodities, Rates, GSP, etc.
• Corresponding Technology partners from the above-mentioned asset classes
• Application Development team
• Front Line Production Support

Knowledge/Experience:
• 7+ years of experience developing on a distributed, high volume, global application in the financial industry (preferably on a trading platform)
• Strong grasp of fundamental computer science concepts: data structures, algorithms, concurrency, and object-oriented design
• Proficiency in enterprise level application development using J2EE, Oracle (or comparable database) and Messaging infrastructure like Solace, Kafka, Tibco EMS
• Good knowledge of Distributed databases/ Caching technologies like Gemfire, Apache Ignite, Couchbase
• Knowledge of full software development and testing lifecycle
• Knowledge of trading systems and trade life cycle – especially front-to-back office processes for Capital Markets asset classes like FX, Equities, Rates, etc. is a strong plus
• Real-time, high frequency, low latency trading system experience is a strong plus
• Credit Risk, Margin Trading knowledge is a plus
• HTML 5/Angular JS experience is a plus
• FIX protocol, Socket communication experience is a plus

Skills:
• Ability to see the whole picture without losing attention to detail
• Good relationship management skills with the ability to effectively negotiate and handle conflicts
• Ability to resolve user queries related to application and analyse/provide quick solution to production issues/queries
• Excellent planning and organizational skills
• Strong oral and written communication skills
• Capability of multi-tasking and working under pressure
• Ability to target delivery dates and work with minimum supervision
• Self-driven person with a problem-solving attitude

Education:
• Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experience

This job description provides a high-level review of the types of work performed. Other job-related duties may be assigned as required.

-------------------------------------------------

jobs_results.title: Senior Game Programmer
jobs_results.description:
Show recruiters you're immediatley available for job opportunities Posted On: 4 days ago Total Views: 2 Job Id: 27750341 Permanent Job Job Description Gamelogic started out with a small group of gaming enthusiasts and has since expanded into a full-fledged game development studio

As gaming enthusiasts, we are adamant about one thing: which is to have fun

We are experts in having a good time and we hope to offer fellow gamers a chance to unleash their inner child through our awesome games

Our goal is to create innovative casual games that will penetrate the global market

Our team is made up of experienced game designers, programmers and artists and we are constantly looking to nurture the next generation of game developers

When it comes to gaming for us at Gamelogic; the sky’s the limit. ------------------------ Title: Senior Game Programmer Responsibilities: · Brainstorming game concepts, design elements, and specifications with the game design team. · Leading a team of... programmers and set work schedules and deadlines. · Assist project leaders with statistical testing, and suggest new methods based on output. · Selecting suitable game frameworks and translating concepts into clean and efficient code. · Designing and testing gameplay features and prototypes. · Generating game scripts and storyboards, as well as animating game characters and objects. · Contributing to user interface development, as well as the integration of graphic design and audio features. · Performing tests and implementing validation procedures. · Documenting the full lifecycle of game development. · Maintaining code, resolving issues, and performing bug fixes. · Integrating the latest game industry trends into game designs. · Working closely with a lead game developer to create task/project deliverables. · Interface with Quality Assurance, Game Producers, Game Designers and Artists

Requirements: · Bachelor's degree in computer science, computer engineering, or similar. · At least 5 years experience as a game programmer. · Proficiency in Unity3D. · Able to work in Windows, Linux and Mac environment. · In-depth knowledge of full lifecycle game programming and related technologies. · Highly proficient in programming languages, such as C++, C# and Java. · Superb analytical and problem-solving skills. · Excellent communication and collaboration abilities. · Great organizational and time management skills. · Able to troubleshoot and solve complex technical issues. · Highly analytical with excellent written and verbal communication skills. · Excellent time management skills with the ability to work under pressure to meet tight deadlines. · Contribute to innovation in game design

Bonus: · Coursework or certification in game design and development preferred

Gamelogic started out with a small group of gaming enthusiasts and has since expanded into a full-fledged game development studio

As gaming enthusiasts, we are adamant about one thing: which is to ha You will be working with a team of hardworking and passionate dream chasers to develop a TRPG mobile game

Title: Game Programmer/Unity Developer Responsibilities: - Work closely with development Job Requirements & Responsibilities: 1 skilled and passionate game developers in the full development cycle of a game (from conception of a feature to the full implementation of it) 2 Experience in Job Description Design of systems/content following the creative and game direction; Champion and driving force for the features/content in charge of, always pushing to improve the quality & fun of wh We are on the prowl for more Bears to join us at our Global HQ (AKA Bear Force One)! Being a Bear means that you’ll be part of a culture that celebrates diversity and is dedicated to making games whic Gamelogic started out with a small group of gaming enthusiasts and has since expanded into a full-fledged game development studio

As gaming enthusiasts, we are adamant about one thing: which is to ha Job Description: * Be involved and participate in the overall game development life cycle. * Main focus on coding and debugging. * Define and communicate technical and design requirements. You will be working with a team of hardworking and passionate dream chasers to develop a TRPG mobile game

Title: Game Designer Responsibilities: -Work closely with the team to brainstorm ideas a Game Designers Work Location: Redhill (Hoy Fatt Road), will be moving in May/Jun2021 to Pasir Panjang area (near MRT station), Singapore Company Benefits: · 13-month fixed bonus, known as Annu Gamelogic started out with a small group of gaming enthusiasts and has since expanded into a full-fledged game development studio

jobs_results.title: Staff Software Engineer ( L3 - ETL & Reporting)
Software Engineer (Java Microservices)
jobs_results.description:
EPAM is committed to providing our global team of more than 41,150 EPAMers with inspiring careers from day one. EPAMers think creatively and lead with passion and honesty. Our people are the source of our success. We value collaboration, work in partnership with our customers, and strive for the highest standards of excellence. In today’s market conditions, we’re supporting operations for hundreds of clients around the world remotely. No matter where you are located, you’ll join a dedicated, diverse community that will help you discover your fullest potential.

DESCRIPTION
We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer specializing in Java Microservices in Singapore to make the team stronger.
Responsibilities
• Write high quality, testable code following clean code and SOLID design principles
• Conduct code reviews
• Create design, technical and project documentation
• Plan and schedule own work for tasks and projects, also implement functionality without direct supervision
•... Perform profiling and troubleshooting of existing solutions
• Coordinate application deployment
• Follow and understand defined software development process
• Participate in workshops and presentation of proposed solutions to clients
• Communicate with the clients on a regular basis to clarify business requirements
• Assist team members with providing of technical solutions
• Work independently while in close collaboration with others in the team and across projects
Requirements
• Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related majors
• Strong programming experience of more than 5 years and deep knowledge on data structure and algorithms
• Typical tech stack for this role: Java 8/11, Spring Boot, JUnit/Mockito, MySQL, Kafka, Avro, git, Jenkins, PCF, DDD/BDD/TDD
• Need to be strong in Spring Cloud
• Strong Microservices
• DS and Algorithms: looking for problem solving skills and the ability to optimize code
• PCF: Manage and own the pipeline. We will consider strong Developers without PCF experience but the individual must be willing to learn PCF quickly
• Fundamental knowledge on Docker and Kubernetes will be helpful. Know how to scale up and down etc
• Secure coding practices
• OS: Linux etc. Basic commands knowledge needed to browse the logs etc. to understand the issues better
Nice to have
• Pair programming experience: Currently not completely doing Pair programming but would like to get there in near future
We offer
• Friendly team and enjoyable working environment
• Work-life balance and flexible schedule
• Online training library, mentoring, career development and potential partial grant of certification
• Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions
• Referral bonuses
• Compensation for sick leave and paid time off
• Opportunities for self-realization

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer (Java)
jobs_results.description:
EPAM is committed to providing our global team of more than 41,150 EPAMers with inspiring careers from day one. EPAMers think creatively and lead with passion and honesty. Our people are the source of our success. We value collaboration, work in partnership with our customers, and strive for the highest standards of excellence. In today’s market conditions, we’re supporting operations for hundreds of clients around the world remotely. No matter where you are located, you’ll join a dedicated, diverse community that will help you discover your fullest potential.

DESCRIPTION
We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer specialized in Java for our Singapore office to make the team stronger.
Responsibilities
• Hands-on developer who writes high quality, secure code that is modular, functional and testable
• Create or introduce, test, and deploy new technology to optimize the service
• Contribute to all parts of the software's development include design, development... documentation and testing
• Have strong ownership of your team's software and are deep in maintenance characteristics, runtime properties and dependencies including hardware, operating system, and build
• Communicate, collaborate and work effectively in a global environment
Requirements
• At least 7 years of experience in the IT industry
• Degree in Computer Science or related field
• Experience with spring framework is mandatory
• Strong foundation in algorithms, data structures and core computer science concepts
• Evidence of working with object-oriented development and design patterns
• Proficiency in Java and Kotlin, other modern programming language is a plus
• Key technology focus areas: Java, Spring Boot, Kotlin, MariaDB, PCF, MQ
• Strong written and verbal English communication skills
• Strong analytical and excellent problem solving skills
• Experience working in an Agile environment
• Experience with XP, TDD and BDD in the software development processes
• Proficiency with CI/CD, DevOps, modern tools such as Git and Jira
• Experience designing scalable fault tolerant platforms that are resilient to infrastructure failures
We offer
• Friendly team and enjoyable working environment
• Work-life balance and flexible schedule
• Online training library, mentoring, career development and potential partial grant of certification
• Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions
• Referral bonuses
• Compensation for sick leave and paid time off
• Opportunities for self-realization

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer (Mobile + React Native)
jobs_results.description:
EPAM is committed to providing our global team of more than 41,150 EPAMers with inspiring careers from day one. EPAMers think creatively and lead with passion and honesty. Our people are the source of our success. We value collaboration, work in partnership with our customers, and strive for the highest standards of excellence. In today’s market conditions, we’re supporting operations for hundreds of clients around the world remotely. No matter where you are located, you’ll join a dedicated, diverse community that will help you discover your fullest potential.

DESCRIPTION
We are looking for an experienced Senior / Software Engineer (Mobile + React Native) in Singapore to make the team stronger.

Experience in design and implementation of mobile applications for iOS s written on React Native using Javascript, Swift, or Objective-C. If you’re right for this role, you should have a background in native iOS development and be comfortable developing with React Native.

We Value
Value the... individuals – We encourage and motivate people to grow. We perceive our people as a source of our success;
Strive for excellence – We strive for the highest standards of excellence and continuously learn. We take pride in our engineering and accomplishments;
Act as a team – We treat one another with respect and encourage the best ideas to come from anywhere within the organization. We value our diversity;
Focus on Customers – We build long term customer relationships, as we strive to always understand our customers' business and needs;
Act with integrity – We operate legally, honestly and ethically. We take responsibility for our actions.
Responsibilities
• Design and develop the public APIs and internal library services
• Implement new feature, bug fixing, and performance tuning
• Work closely with the Frontend and Engine teams to integrate new features and unique consumer-facing products
• Explore and evaluate new stack components and architecture ideas as necessary
• Review code regularly
• Collaborate with product managers & designers, prototyping and bringing breakthrough experiences to our users
• Add strength to our engineering culture by meeting & setting new standards of engineering, via participating in code review, team discussion & leading by example with solid coding practices
• Guarantee a smooth user experience by writing well tested & highly performant code
• Develop the BitMEX React Native mobile application
• Develop native iOS components for the React Native application
• Maintain, scale, and perform tuning for iOS
• Mentor other engineers on coding practices, design philosophies, and engineering craft
• Explore and evaluate new stack components and architecture ideas as necessary
• Android experience is a plus
Requirements
• Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
• Senior Software Engineer - At least 6-8 years of iOS development experience with Javascript and/or React Native
• Software Engineer - At least 4-6 years of iOS development experience with Javascript and/or React Native
• Significant experience scaling iOS applications to a large diversity of devices
• Experience with mobile end-to-end testing
• Experience making complex, data-driven products accessible to consumers
• Ability to simultaneously develop several products and concepts in development
• Familiarity with current UX trends and curiosity for new UX concepts (conversational UI, etc)
• Demonstrable ability to work in small teams and is willing to take ownership over product features
• Detail oriented, able to focus, and is comfortable submerging into the depths of code in order to emerge with new insights & a way forward
• Have passion for technological innovation, with a keen interest in what’s happening in the crypto space
• Fluent in written and verbal English
• Ability to communicate at all levels, with both business and technology staff
• Ability to work independently
• Open minded, eager to learn and self-motivated
• Good understanding of Agile methodologies, especially Scrum
Nice to have
• Familiar with API performance improvements
• Experience building scalable systems that deliver real-time data over the web
• Working with databases, AWS/Azure/Cloud
We offer
• Friendly team and enjoyable working environment
• Work-life balance and flexible schedule
• Online training library, mentoring, career development and potential partial grant of certification
• Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions
• Referral bonuses
• Compensation for sick leave and paid time off
• Opportunities for self-realization

jobs_results.title: Software Engineer/ Associate Consultant/ Lead Engineer/ Senior Software Engineer/ Consultant - Veeva
jobs_results.description:
More than 3+ years’ experience in Merck SDLC development and GATE support Program.
Must be able to develop a dashboard or analytics reports using CRM OD.

Experience Required In Oracle CRM On Demand Integration.

Analyze/troubleshoot the SSIS jobs used for ETL.
Good to have understanding of VEEVA architecture, data model and security model
Able to translate business requirements into technical specifications
Good to have experience in ITIL Process like Incident, Knowledge, Change and Release management
Lead life sciences customers in the rapid configuration ,implementation and project Management of the Vault Regulatory software suite (Vault Registrations, Vault Submissions, Vault Submissions Archive, Vault Publishing)
Architect multi-phased implementation programs to deploy Vault RIM across an organization globally
Digital Marketing & Channels – Pharmaceutical Consent Hub data process flow experience (must)

Experience working with Zinc

Expertise in managing the Project related Veeva campaign Management, remote interaction.
Primary customer liaison managing relationships and communication between the project team, customer and internal stakeholders
Program and project management including resource planning, leading and motivating a cross-functional team, and project tracking and forecasting
Collate and share life sciences industry best practices with our customers around commercial excellence. Evangelize Multichannel customer relationship management in the life sciences industry.

Mandate Skills
Certified Project Management Professional from PMI
Certified in Veeva CRM
Experience in Veeva Vault
Must delivered program budget ranging USD 10 Mil
Well Versed with multiple module program Integration
Good Experience in working in Pharma domain
Well versed with GxP Guidelines

MSPS, IVE, MSP
GxP Guidelines, LOMA Nomenclarure, SOX guidelines.
Veeva Vault
Oracle CRM OD certification
Veeva CRM

Oracle, MYSQL

Situation Intelliegence tool

Oracle CRM OD certification
Veeva Vault

Technical / Professional Skills
IoT, Blockchain, Enterprise Architect

Non-Technical / Soft Skills
Excellent Communication skills & a team leader.
Proven ability to work with people from different cultures
A high level of intelligence; ability to operate not only on the basis of important past experiences, but in the light of the approaches and developments that occur in the market.
Natural problem solving inclination
High level presentation and interpersonal skills
Experience decomposing complex problems into component parts for effective problem solving
